Abstract: This is the browse data associated with a particular granule.
Purpose: This file contains the Browse data associated with the production of a particular product granule. The primary purpose of this file is the systematic QA analysis to be performed at the MISR SCF.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: SP_AM_PATH_NO
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Number in the range 1-233 represents path number within EOS repeat cycle.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: SP_AM_MISR_StartBlock
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Integer number within the MISR data coverage blocking scheme of block in which granule data STARTs; range 1-180; default 1.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: SP_AM_MISR_EndBlock
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Integer number within the MISR data coverage blocking scheme of block in which granule data ENDs; range 1-180; default 180.

AdditionalAttributes.Name: SP_AM_MISR_ProductVersion
AdditionalAttributes.Description: Integer number corresponding to the product version field within the local granule id of the MISR products. Will support the production rule that selects dynamic inputs based on the product version number.

Platforms.LongName: First EOS Polar Orbiting Satellite, 10:30 AM Descending Equator Crossing

Characteristics.Name: EquatorCrossingTime
Characteristics.Description: Local time of the equator crossing and direction (ascending or descending)

Characteristics.Name: OrbitInclination
Characteristics.Description: Angle between the orbit plane and the Earth's equatorial plane

Characteristics.Name: SwathWidth
Characteristics.Description: The width of the sensor scan as the satellite moves along the ground track.
